name: LogX Network
description: What is LogX ? LogX - Bringing the $2 Quadrillion Forex Market Onchain LogX is the world’s first Stablecoin Forex infrastructure. Forex is the largest market in the world, processing over $2 Quadrillion annually. With stablecoins surging and regulations opening the door, FX is set to become the biggest onchain market. Full-stack LogX product suite powering Stablecoin FX: • Forex Hedging - Institutional-grade risk tools for neobanks & treasuries. • API Access - Plug-and-play rails with embedded compliance controls for fintechs & trading platforms. • Forex Perpetuals - Leverage global currencies with deep TradFi liquidity. • Forex Spot - Swap stablecoin FX pairs on a lightning-fast onchain orderbook. The $LOGX token fuels governance & utility across the ecosystem as LogX builds the core rails of onchain Forex.
